channel.title: Need help now!
channel.description:
Okay..I'm sick of posting when I need help and I get NO responses.
I need major help here and no one will help ?
What the hell,do you guys have something against me or something? Like seriously?I really thought this was a helpful community.. And don't tell me to use the search bar.I did and found nothing of what I needed.
Same thing with google,and others teamveiwed with me and still didn't help...
Seriously,just help me out and I will return the favour..-.-
It's called Karma...

item.title: Need help now!
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

Alright,I have already portforwarded,and I have set the No-ip into the client,java file in the client,but IN the client it’s self,there is a applet_sub.java file in there that has a 127.0.0.1 IP in there,and I’m guessing I should Change that to localhost or 0.0.0.0?
Cause Im not that great on all this Ip crap,so yeah.This is my best guess.

EDIT:And this is where people start to stop,and just let me burn in hell,guess I can just kiss my dreams goodbye…unbelievable…

EDIT#2:ROFL I GOT IT!!!THANK YOU JESUS!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help now!
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

All you do is set up the no-ip to something like youservername.no-ip.biz and then log onto your server using 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0, but you also have to be portforwarded. Try that and if it doesnt work then sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help now!
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

Finally someone responds!
Well ,its basic,It’s just I’m not very familiar with doing this,
I need help setting my No-Ip on my RSPS to go viral,but When I set the No-Ip,i can’t log on anymore,so all I can do is play on localhost.

So im asking for help if anyone knows how to resolve my problem on putting my rsps online.

Read full topic
